dialogue.text: H-Huh?
Desperation calls, a faint creak from the dark...?
Can't mope around, I have a customer... I think...
Grüezi! Bienvenu! Ciao! Welcome to my store!
Happy days are calling! You ARE real! Ha!
How was your trip?
Did you see something that caught your eye?
Something like... A path.. A road... A broken door...
... An unremaining stone... An impatient heaven... A lingering overabundance of lies... a hint of sweet clematis...
...Anything?
えっ？！
Nothing...
NOTHING AT ALL?!??!
It's fine... As long as those pockets are impregnated with cash-
NO MONEY TOO?!?!

What a starved wallet! I- I mean, you did find your way here, one way or a wronger. But I can't simply turn down a valuable (albeit, poor...) customer. I'm nice, I'm nice after all, nice enough to let you uhh...
Play my games!
Anything worth your dazzling eyes is a prize to be won! My shelves have interactable trinkets that you can access and play at any moment! Pretty catching! ...right?
Huh? The prize...
I have a small ask for you...
Do me a favour and visit me and my rotten orange palette, for as much as you can, if you can, ねぇ～？
